feed.title: Patch to UNIX makefile to remove -DFOURWAYSSE2

entry.title: Patch to UNIX makefile to remove -DFOURWAYSSE2
entry.summary: Venkatesh Srinivas suggested that the flag '-DFOURWAYSSE2' be removed as it is considered obsolete. Jeff Garzik, who works at exMULTI, Inc., applied the suggestion.
